title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.11 - Interest on affirmed award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.11 - Interest on affirmed award

State Regulations

In the event an original award for deposit in the aggregate
trust fund is affirmed on review or appeal, the interest at the rate provided
in section
5004
of the Civil Practice Law and Rules
which is payable direct to the claimant on past due and unpaid compensation
payments shall be calculated on such past due compensation covering not only
periods up to the date of valuation of aggregate trust fund deposit but also on
past due and unpaid compensation payments covering the period from the date of
valuation of aggregate trust fund deposit up to the date of affirmance of the
award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
393.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
